backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access-controlled user profiles and contact message storage with admin-restricted retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented UI/UX features to source files and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup file providing short descriptions of all frontend components, sections, hooks, and shared utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining brand color variables, theming tokens, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry template setting metadata, fonts, and mounting point for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all site sections within the SiteLayout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form with validation, input fields, and backend submission using React Query.
frontend/src/components/contact/DevSubmi: Development-only panel that fetches and displays all contact form submissions for admin testing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, social icons, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Implements a responsive navbar with scroll-to-section navigation, mobile drawer menu, and brand logo.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site structure with navbar, footer, skip link, and main content slot.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, description, grade/weight tags, and an enquiry button opening WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Shows the About section with headings and descriptive text about sourcing and quality.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides contact info, WhatsApp order button, optional dev panel, and an embedded Google Map.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Hero section with background image, CTA buttons, and feature icons highlighting key product qualities.
frontend/src/components/sections/index.t: Re-exports all section components for simplified imports.
frontend/src/components/sections/Product: Lists premium products using ProductCard components with reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Renders customer testimonials with star ratings in card layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Renders a branded 'Why Choose' section with animated reveal effects and a grid of reasons using icon components.
frontend/src/components/shared/BrandButt: Provides a styled button component with brand-specific variants and utility-based styling.
frontend/src/components/shared/BrandCard: Wraps content in a styled card with optional hover effects and brand theme classes.
frontend/src/components/shared/Reveal.ts: Animates children into view using an intersection observer hook with optional delay.
frontend/src/components/shared/Section.t: Defines a section wrapper with spacing and container layout classes.
frontend/src/components/shared/SkipToCon: Provides an accessible skip link for keyboard users to jump to main content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of a backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactSubmissions: Provides hooks for submitting and fetching contact messages via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for organizing feature-specific queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Detects when an element enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver to trigger reveal animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines the application's brand color system using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a section by ID while compensating for sticky navbar height.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Provides a helper that opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message based on enquiry context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, brand colors, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, goals, required images, features, and architectural notes for the Spice Lux website build.
